channel.title: Check Out the Latest News from the World of Rock and Metal on Fandoming
channel.description: Recent content in Check Out the Latest News from the World of Rock and Metal on Fandoming

item.title: Get Hands-On With Super Mario Party Jamboree Before Launch
item.description: Super Mario Party Jamboree demo kiosks are now available at Target, Best Buy, and GameStop.

item.title: Classic Weapons Make Their Way to Modern WoW During 20th Anniversary
item.description: Epic weapons from WoW Classic Season of Discovery are coming to modern WoW during the 20th-anniversary event.

item.title: Virtua Fighter 6 Might Be in the Works, Say Insiders
item.description: Let’s rewind to Virtua Fighter, a game that basically dragged the fighting genre into the 3D era, kicking and screaming.

item.title: Nintendo Teases New Feature for Switch Online Users
item.description: Nintendo just dropped a bomb on us, teasing a new Nintendo Switch Online feature with almost zero details.

item.title: Fan Theory Confirmed in Silent Hill 2 Remake: Mary’s Body
item.description: Mary’s body confirmed to be in James’ car in the Silent Hill 2 Remake.
